Class GameManager

  • Field Details

    • gameState

      private final GameState gameState

    • gameConstants

      private final GameConstants gameConstants

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(int numPlayers, boolean expertMatch)
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players for this game (2, 3 or 4).
      expertMatch - true if the match is the expert version, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of players is illegal.

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(GameState gameState)
      Create GameManager from pre-existing game state.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the state of the game.

  • Method Details

    • restoreHallListeners

      private void restoreHallListeners(GameState state)

    • restoreCharacterEffects

      private void restoreCharacterEffects(GameState state)

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState()

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String name, Wizard wizard, Tower tower)
      Add a player to the game. When a player is added the wizard and the tower chosen are removed from the ones available.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player.
      wizard - the wizard chosen by the player.
      tower - the tower chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if players with same name, wizard or tower are added.

    • createPlayer

      private Player createPlayer(String name, Wizard wizard, Tower tower)

    • isLeader

      private boolean isLeader(Tower tower)

    • createBoard

      private Board createBoard(Tower tower, boolean leader)
      Create a board with all the towers. The number of towers depends on the number of players. GameManager will listen for coin events.
      Parameters:
      tower - tower type
      Returns:
      the board

    • preparation

      public void preparation()
      Sets up the game

    • fillClouds

      public void fillClouds()
      This is the first step in the planning stage: - Fill the clouds with students. - The number of students depends on the number of players. - When the bag is empty no more students are added to the clouds.

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(Assistant assistant)
      This is the second step of the Planning stage. Tell what assistant has played the current player.
      Parameters:
      assistant - the assistant played by the player
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the player doesn't have the assistant or if it's called during Action stage
      PlayerIdAlreadyPresentException - if it's called two times for the same player

    • moveStudentFromEntranceToHall

      public void moveStudentFromEntranceToHall(Student student)
      This is the first step of ACTION stage. Move a student from the current player Entrance to his Hall.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to move from the entrance.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the student cannot be removed from entrance or added to the Hall.

    • moveStudentFromEntranceToIsland

      public void moveStudentFromEntranceToIsland(Student student, int islandPosition)
      This is the first step of ACTION stage. Move a student from the current player Entrance to the specified island
      Parameters:
      student - the student to move from the entrance.
      islandPosition - the id of the island where the student will be placed.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the student cannot be removed from entrance or added to the Island.

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int steps)
      This is the second step of ACTION stage. Move mother nature with the specified number of steps.
      Parameters:
      steps - mother nature steps to perform.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the number of steps is not valid

    • pickStudentsFromCloud

      public void pickStudentsFromCloud(int cloudId)
      This is the third step ot the ACTION stage Moves the students on the selected cloud to the current player entrance
      Parameters:
      cloudId - the id of the selected cloud

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      This is the last step of the action stage. It's important to have this stage otherwise player won't be able to play a character after picking students from cloud.

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound()

    • playCharacter

      public void playCharacter(CharacterType characterType, EffectArgs effectArgs)
      Plays the given character. This can be played in any moment of the ACTION stage
      Parameters:
      characterType - the character to be played
      effectArgs - the parameters for applying the character effect
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the character is played in non-expert matches

    • proceedToNextStage

      private void proceedToNextStage()

    • endMatch

      private void endMatch()
      This method must be called when the game ends. It sets the winner in the game state if there is any.

    • allCloudsEmpty

      private boolean allCloudsEmpty()

    • shouldWaitForOtherPlayers

      private boolean shouldWaitForOtherPlayers()

    • setStudentsToMove

      private void setStudentsToMove()

    • mustMoveOtherStudents

      private boolean mustMoveOtherStudents()

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      If the event is grabCoin from the hall it increments the coins for the current player (the one who made the last move)
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - property change event that fired this method
